verses.text: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w advantage|strong="G4053"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w of|strong="G2228"\w* \w being|strong="G3767"\w* \w a|strong="G2228"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G5101"\w* \w of|strong="G2228"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*?

\w Great|strong="G4183"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w way|strong="G5158"\w*. \w First|strong="G4413"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* Jews \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w entrusted|strong="G4100"\w* \w with|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w utterances|strong="G3051"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* follows \w then|strong="G1063"\w*? \w Some|strong="G5100"\w*, \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w doubt|strong="G1063"\w*, showed \w a|strong="G1487"\w* want \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* want \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w make|strong="G2673"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* break \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*? Heaven forbid!

\w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w must|strong="G2919"\w* \w prove|strong="G1096"\w* \w true|strong="G3588"\w*, \w though|strong="G2532"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w prove|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w liar|strong="G5583"\w*! \w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1125"\w* \w says|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* – “\w That|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w pronounced|strong="G2919"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w say|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gain \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w cause|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w people|strong="G3956"\w* \w would|strong="G1096"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* wrongdoing makes \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w all|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* clearer? \w Will|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G3361"\w* wrong \w in|strong="G2596"\w* inflicting punishment? (\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1487"\w* \w person|strong="G5101"\w*.) Heaven forbid!
\w Otherwise|strong="G1893"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G4459"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* falsehood redounds \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w by|strong="G1722"\w* making \w his|strong="G1519"\w* truthfulness \w more|strong="G2089"\w* apparent, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w am|strong="G2504"\w* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w*, \w still|strong="G2089"\w* \w condemned|strong="G2919"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* sinner?

\w Why|strong="G2443"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* – \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w* slanderously assert \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* – “\w Let|strong="G1510"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w good|strong="G3588"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*”? \w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w condemnation|strong="G2917"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w such|strong="G5100"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w* \w just|strong="G2531"\w*!

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* follows, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*? \w Are|strong="G1510"\w* \w we|strong="G1063"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w way|strong="G3956"\w* superior \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w others|strong="G3956"\w*? \w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w at|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Our|strong="G2532"\w* indictment \w against|strong="G5259"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w alike|strong="G5037"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* subjection \w to|strong="G2532"\w* sin.

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1125"\w* says – “\w There|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w even|strong="G3761"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*,

\w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w understands|strong="G4920"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* searching \w for|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*!

\w They|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* gone astray; \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w and|strong="G4160"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w become|strong="G1510"\w* depraved; \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* – \w no|strong="G3756"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*!”

“\w Their|strong="G3588"\w* \w throats|strong="G2995"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w like|strong="G1100"\w* opened \w graves|strong="G5028"\w*; \w they|strong="G3588"\w* deceive \w with|strong="G5259"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*.” “\w The|strong="G3588"\w* venom \w of|strong="G5259"\w* snakes lies behind \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w lips|strong="G5491"\w*,”
“\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w mouths|strong="G4750"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* bitter curses.”
“\w Swift|strong="G3691"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w to|strong="G3588"\w* \w shed|strong="G1632"\w* blood.
Distress \w and|strong="G2532"\w* trouble dog \w their|strong="G2532"\w* steps,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w path|strong="G3598"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w*.”

“\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w before|strong="G3588"\w* \w their|strong="G3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G3754"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w everything|strong="G3956"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* addressed \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w under|strong="G1722"\w* \w its|strong="G3956"\w* authority, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w order|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w closed|strong="G5420"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w bring|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w under|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s judgment.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w human|strong="G4561"\w* \w being|strong="G1344"\w* \w will|strong="G3956"\w* \w be|strong="G3756"\w* pronounced \w righteous|strong="G1344"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* God \w as|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w result|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* obedience \w to|strong="G3756"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G1063"\w* \w is|strong="G3956"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* shows \w what|strong="G1063"\w* sin \w is|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w*, quite \w apart|strong="G5565"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* divine \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* stands \w revealed|strong="G5319"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* –

\w the|strong="G1519"\w* divine \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w bestowed|strong="G1519"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w without|strong="G3756"\w* \w distinction|strong="G1293"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* sinned, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w fall|strong="G5302"\w* \w short|strong="G5302"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* ideal,

\w but|strong="G3588"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* loving kindness, \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w being|strong="G5547"\w* \w freely|strong="G1432"\w* pronounced \w righteous|strong="G1344"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* deliverance found \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* set \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w before|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* world, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G1519"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* shedding \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* blood, \w a|strong="G1519"\w* \w means|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* reconciliation \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*. \w And|strong="G2316"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w did|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* prove \w his|strong="G1223"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2316"\w* \w because|strong="G1223"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1223"\w* forbearance, \w he|strong="G3739"\w* \w had|strong="G2316"\w* \w passed|strong="G3588"\w* \w over|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* sins \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2316"\w* \w previously|strong="G4266"\w* \w committed|strong="G4266"\w*;

\w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w proof|strong="G4102"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* repeat, \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w present|strong="G3568"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* own \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* eyes, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* pronounce \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w person|strong="G1342"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* takes \w their|strong="G2532"\w* stand \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w What|strong="G4169"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, becomes \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G1223"\w* \w boasting|strong="G2746"\w*? \w It|strong="G1223"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w excluded|strong="G1576"\w*. \w By|strong="G1223"\w* \w what|strong="G4169"\w* sort \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*? \w A|strong="G1223"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w* requiring obedience? \w No|strong="G3780"\w*, \w a|strong="G1223"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w* requiring \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G1063"\w* conclude \w that|strong="G1063"\w* \w a|strong="G2041"\w* person \w is|strong="G4102"\w* pronounced \w righteous|strong="G1344"\w* \w on|strong="G3049"\w* \w the|strong="G1063"\w* ground \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, quite \w apart|strong="G5565"\w* \w from|strong="G5565"\w* obedience \w to|strong="G3049"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w* can \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*? Isn’\w t|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*?

Yes, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Gentiles \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w since|strong="G1537"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w only|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* pronounce \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w circumcised|strong="G4061"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1344"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w result|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* uncircumcised \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* showing \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G3739"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G1096"\w* \w we|strong="G3767"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w use|strong="G3588"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w to|strong="G1096"\w* abolish \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*? Heaven \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*! \w No|strong="G3361"\w*, \w we|strong="G3767"\w* \w establish|strong="G2476"\w* \w Law|strong="G3551"\w*.
